alert.note: Alert for Posey; Vanderburgh (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:44AM EST until February 12 at 4:20PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, Newburgh Dam, and J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. The river at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, Newburgh Dam, and J.T. Myers will remain in minor flood as they have already crested, or will crest soon, and they will all fall below flood stage sometime this weekend. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
